name: PowerCenter:Avoid creating identical Transformations
description:
A Transformation is identical with another one if he has same number of fields, same fields type and same expressions.
This metric measures the ratio between the number of copy/pasted transformations and the total number of transformations. 
Also, for optimal efficiency, the rule is enabled only for transformations larger than X fields.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all copy/pasted Transformations.
It provides the following information:
Mapping or Mapplet full name, Source Qualifier full name and duplicated Source Qualifier name
rationale: A mapping with a lot of duplicate transformations is hard to change and to maintain. It might be required to change every copy of a copy/pasted object while it is very difficult to locate these copy/pasted code elements.
total: Total number of Mappings, Mapplets and Folders
